category.name: Product Structure.PSE Column
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: QSEARCH_queue_recurring_background_updates
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether to create a recurring dispatcher request for qsearch_process_queue.The QSEARCH_foreground_processing_halted preference must be set to true before setting this preference. Recurring dispatcher requests will be executed on a regular time interval by dispatcher. You may also set the following two preferences to specify the time interval and life span of the recurring dispatcher request: QSEARCH_recurring_background_update_survival_time and QSEARCH_recurring_background_update_interval. Valid Values: True A recurring dispatcher request is created. False A dispatcher request is created, but it is not a recurring request.
